con:part.con:content: <application xmlns="http://wadl.dev.java.net/2009/02" xmlns:gps="http://gps.telefonica.com/types"> <grammars> <include href="gps_types_v1.0.xsd"/> </grammars> <resources base="http://localhost:8090/gps/v1"> <resource path="/creditcards"> <resource path="/registrations"> <method name="POST" id="initCreditCardRegistrationPayment"> <request> <representation mediaType="application/json" element="gps:creditCardRegistrationPayment"/> <representation mediaType="application/xml" element="gps:creditCardRegistrationPayment"/> </request> <response status="200"> <representation mediaType="application/json" element="gps:paymentServiceProviderForm"/> <representation mediaType="application/xml" element="gps:paymentServiceProviderForm"/> </response> <response status="400"> <representation mediaType="application/json" element="gps:errorResponse"/> <representation mediaType="application/xml" element="gps:errorResponse"/> </response> <response status="402"> <representation mediaType="application/json" element="gps:errorResponse"/> <representation mediaType="application/xml" element="gps:errorResponse"/> </response> <response status="500"> <representation mediaType="application/json" element="gps:errorResponse"/> <representation mediaType="application/xml" element="gps:errorResponse"/> </response> <response status="502"> <representation mediaType="application/json" element="gps:errorResponse"/> <representation mediaType="application/xml" element="gps:errorResponse"/> </response> <response status="503"> <representation mediaType="application/json" element="gps:errorResponse"/> <representation mediaType="application/xml" element="gps:errorResponse"/> </response> </method> <resource path="{token}"> <param name="token" style="template" type="gps:token"/> <method name="GET" id="getCreditCardRegistrationPaymentByToken"> <response status="200"> <representation mediaType="application/json" element="gps:transaction"/> <representation mediaType="application/xml" element="gps:transaction"/> </response> <response status="400"> <representation mediaType="application/json" element="gps:errorResponse"/> <representation mediaType="application/xml" element="gps:errorResponse"/> </response> <response status="402"> <representation mediaType="application/json" element="gps:errorResponse"/> <representation mediaType="application/xml" element="gps:errorResponse"/> </response> <response status="500"> <representation mediaType="application/json" element="gps:errorResponse"/> <representation mediaType="application/xml" element="gps:errorResponse"/> </response> <response status="502"> <representation mediaType="application/json" element="gps:errorResponse"/> <representation mediaType="application/xml" element="gps:errorResponse"/> </response> <response status="503"> <representation mediaType="application/json" element="gps:errorResponse"/> <representation mediaType="application/xml" element="gps:errorResponse"/> </response> </method> </resource> </resource> <resource path="{aliasId}"> <param name="aliasId" style="template" type="gps:creditCardAliasId"/> <method name="GET" id="getCreditCardByAliasId"> <response status="200"> <representation mediaType="application/json" element="gps:creditCard"/> <representation mediaType="application/xml" element="gps:creditCard"/> </response> <response status="400"> <representation mediaType="application/json" element="gps:errorResponse"/> <representation mediaType="application/xml" element="gps:errorResponse"/> </response> <response status="500"> <representation mediaType="application/json" element="gps:errorResponse"/> <representation mediaType="application/xml" element="gps:errorResponse"/> </response> <response status="502"> <representation mediaType="application/json" element="gps:errorResponse"/> <representation mediaType="application/xml" element="gps:errorResponse"/> </response> <response status="503"> <representation mediaType="application/json" element="gps:errorResponse"/> <representation mediaType="application/xml" element="gps:errorResponse"/> </response> </method> <resource path="/transactions"> <method name="POST" id="authorizeRegisteredCreditCardPayment"> <request> <representation mediaType="application/json" element="gps:payment"/> <representation mediaType="application/xml" element="gps:payment"/> </request> <response status="200"> <representation mediaType="application/json" element="gps:transaction"/> <representation mediaType="application/xml" element="gps:transaction"/> </response> <response status="400"> <representation mediaType="application/json" element="gps:errorResponse"/> <representation mediaType="application/xml" element="gps:errorResponse"/> </response> <response status="402"> <representation mediaType="application/json" element="gps:errorResponse"/> <representation mediaType="application/xml" element="gps:errorResponse"/> </response> <response status="500"> <representation mediaType="application/json" element="gps:errorResponse"/> <representation mediaType="application/xml" element="gps:errorResponse"/> </response> <response status="502"> <representation mediaType="application/json" element="gps:errorResponse"/> <representation mediaType="application/xml" element="gps:errorResponse"/> </response> <response status="503"> <representation mediaType="application/json" element="gps:errorResponse"/> <representation mediaType="application/xml" element="gps:errorResponse"/> </response> </method> </resource> <resource path="/deregister"> <method name="PATCH" id="deregisterCreditCard"> <response status="200"> <representation mediaType="application/json" element="gps:creditCard"/> <representation mediaType="application/xml" element="gps:creditCard"/> </response> <response status="400"> <representation mediaType="application/json" element="gps:errorResponse"/> <representation mediaType="application/xml" element="gps:errorResponse"/> </response> <response status="402"> <representation mediaType="application/json" element="gps:errorResponse"/> <representation mediaType="application/xml" element="gps:errorResponse"/> </response> <response status="500"> <representation mediaType="application/json" element="gps:errorResponse"/> <representation mediaType="application/xml" element="gps:errorResponse"/> </response> <response status="502"> <representation mediaType="application/json" element="gps:errorResponse"/> <representation mediaType="application/xml" element="gps:errorResponse"/> </response> <response status="503"> <representation mediaType="application/json" element="gps:errorResponse"/> <representation mediaType="application/xml" element="gps:errorResponse"/> </response> </method> </resource> </resource> </resource> <resource path="/transactions"> <resource path="{transactionId}"> <param name="transactionId" style="template" type="gps:transactionId"/> <method name="GET" id="getTransactionById"> <response status="200"> <representation mediaType="application/json" element="gps:transaction"/> <representation mediaType="application/xml" element="gps:transaction"/> </response> <response status="400"> <representation mediaType="application/json" element="gps:errorResponse"/> <representation mediaType="application/xml" element="gps:errorResponse"/> </response> <response status="500"> <representation mediaType="application/json" element="gps:errorResponse"/> <representation mediaType="application/xml" element="gps:errorResponse"/> </response> <response status="502"> <representation mediaType="application/json" element="gps:errorResponse"/> <representation mediaType="application/xml" element="gps:errorResponse"/> </response> <response status="503"> <representation mediaType="application/json" element="gps:errorResponse"/> <representation mediaType="application/xml" element="gps:errorResponse"/> </response> </method> <resource path="/capture"> <method name="PATCH" id="captureTransaction"> <request> <representation mediaType="application/json" element="gps:captureParameters"/> <representation mediaType="application/xml" element="gps:captureParameters"/> </request> <response status="200"> <representation mediaType="application/json" element="gps:transaction"/> <representation mediaType="application/xml" element="gps:transaction"/> </response> <response status="400"> <representation mediaType="application/json" element="gps:errorResponse"/> <representation mediaType="application/xml" element="gps:errorResponse"/> </response> <response status="402"> <representation mediaType="application/json" element="gps:errorResponse"/> <representation mediaType="application/xml" element="gps:errorResponse"/> </response> <response status="500"> <representation mediaType="application/json" element="gps:errorResponse"/> <representation mediaType="application/xml" element="gps:errorResponse"/> </response> <response status="502"> <representation mediaType="application/json" element="gps:errorResponse"/> <representation mediaType="application/xml" element="gps:errorResponse"/> </response> <response status="503"> <representation mediaType="application/json" element="gps:errorResponse"/> <representation mediaType="application/xml" element="gps:errorResponse"/> </response> </method> </resource> <resource path="/cancel"> <method name="PATCH" id="cancelTransaction"> <response status="200"> <representation mediaType="application/json" element="gps:transaction"/> <representation mediaType="application/xml" element="gps:transaction"/> </response> <response status="400"> <representation mediaType="application/json" element="gps:errorResponse"/> <representation mediaType="application/xml" element="gps:errorResponse"/> </response> <response status="402"> <representation mediaType="application/json" element="gps:errorResponse"/> <representation mediaType="application/xml" element="gps:errorResponse"/> </response> </method> </resource> </resource> </resource> </resources> </application>
